alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 1:39PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG CONTINUES THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING... Areas of fog, locally dense at times, will continue into the early evening hours. Visibilities may be reduced to one quarter mile or lower in the fog at times. This fog is expected to persist into the evening hours as warm, moist air moves over the cold ground and remaining snow cover. Visibility should slowly improve later this evening as rain moves in; with full improvement expected after midnight behind a cold frontal passage. Motorists should be prepared for rapidly changing visibilities and drive with extra caution when encountering this fog. Use low beam headlights and allow for extra spacing between vehicles.
